description:
It was discovered that Burrows-Wheeler Aligner (BWA) mishandled certain
crafted .alt files. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a
denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.
title: BWA vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
BWA could be made to crash or run programs as an administrator
if it opened a specially crafted file.
